name: Wind Rider
description: Flowing with the wind, riding wherever it takes them.
effect:
This pokemon is immune to all wind moves aside from Sandstorm. When hit by a Wind move besides Sandstorm or when Tailwind is activated, this pokemon's Strength is raised by 1. Wind moves include:
- Air Cutter
- Bleakwind Storm
- Blizzard
- Fairy Wind
- Gust
- Heat Wave
- Hurricane
- Icy Wind
- Petal Blizzard
- Sandsear Storm
- Sandstorm
- Springtide Storm
- Tailwind
- Twister
- Whirlwind
- Wildbolt Storm
